We are all about bringing Britain together through
 our messages to the elderly in isolation
 and the NHS workers on the front line

We work using a crowd-funding pool so that the U.K's elderly and NHS frontline can receive all your love regardless of your financial position

 Its 100% free to submit your letter into a pool.

 if you can afford it you can donate to send yours and others letters to those in the U.K. who deserve our support.
